name: Executive Privilege (Skill Card)
skill_activation: At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.
skill_effect:
"Obelisk the Tormentor" can attack all monsters your opponent controls, once each. Once per turn, during your Main Phase, you can activate 1 of these Skills:
● Reveal 1 "Obelisk the Tormentor" and "Blue-Eyes White Dragon" in your hand, place them on the bottom of the Deck in any order, then draw 2 cards.
● Once per Duel, discard 1 card, then add 1 "Obelisk the Tormentor" from your Deck to your hand.
